content: Oh all right to start this project I use a
piece of cardboard and I cut about two and a half inches wide and you can see I
scored between the corrugations I only scored one side and then for the top I
cut a two inch circle and score that also so it looked like boards now in
this next photo much like my barrel video
I scored around the top a half-inch there and bended inwards and then I'm
going to glue the top to that now I also use some glue gun to give the board's
texture because I want to be a rough looking still so now I've got some
styrofoam balls I'm use for part of the contraption of the still and I use some
bendy straws and some stir straws to add some detail so here we go with the still
constructed you can see I've got the bands going around the still itself
those are 1/2 inch or a quarter inch cardstock I've got the straws going up
into the styrofoam balls and just wanted to make an interesting contraption look
there I actually have some stir straw is coming out the front there will be the
tap from the still and so here's another another top view down look at it so you
can see the detail of the straws going into it and one last detail I did was I
used some beads as valves for to turn off the still and and tap it so I those
on the front so now let's go to the table and I'll show you what that looks
like here we go here's our still and mr. Roderick for scale so don't ruin the
neighborhood mr. Roderick and drink all the booze all right let's show our
friends this would close up of the still we got the valve there and the spout I
think they came out really cool the beads really work I love the XXXI paint
on there that's fun you can see the detail of the straws and the styrofoam
balls I painted them copper I think that really looks cool nice details there I
got a little valve on the back also I got the gunmetal banding and the texture
with the glue gun the wood texture I want to have a rough texture so there we
go fun fun fun Wasser
hey you yeah you back here huh I know it was short what do you expect you're the
short tip watch longer episodes if you want Jesus quit bugging me hey and make
sure you join the forum - how much for that
oh yeah and have a magical craft a sick day
